name: bitware-orchestrator-v2
description: Orchestrator 2.0 - Central coordination and resource management for AI Factory

scripts.db:init: wrangler d1 execute orchestrator-v2-db --file=schema/orchestrator.sql && wrangler d1 execute orchestrator-v2-db --file=schema/resources.sql && wrangler d1 execute orchestrator-v2-db --file=schema/execution.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:init && npm run db:seed

author: AI Factory Team
